_comment: Sample configuration file - DO NOT commit real values to source control

Dataverse._comment_auth: Use Managed Identity in production - no secrets needed here

ExternalApi._comment_auth: Configure OAuth client credentials or API key in Key Vault

ServiceBus._comment: In production, use Managed Identity connection string format: Endpoint=sb://YOUR_NAMESPACE.servicebus.windows.net/

KeyVault._comment: Store all secrets in Key Vault, reference using @Microsoft.KeyVault syntax

_security_notes.managed_identity: Azure Function should have System-Assigned Managed Identity enabled
_security_notes.key_vault_access: Grant Managed Identity 'Key Vault Secrets User' role
_security_notes.dataverse_access: Register Function's Managed Identity as App User in Dataverse
_security_notes.service_bus_access: Grant Managed Identity 'Azure Service Bus Data Receiver' role
